title: How To Deal With A Partner Who's Always On Social Media
summary: Dating apps are designed to make us feel like our love lives are always just a couple of swipes away. With so many options, it can be hard to decide who to message next, or to figure out what’s appropriate to say. Your partner might not like being reminded that all of these other people are out there, waiting to meet them. Set aside time to be with each other, even if you’re living together. Don’t let your partner use dating apps as a way to treat others poorly.
